member.name: DVASPECT2
member.summary: Specifies new drawing aspects used to optimize the drawing process.

member.name: DVASPECT2.DVASPECT_OPAQUE
member.summary: Represents the opaque, easy to clip parts of an object. Objects may or may not support this aspect.

member.name: DVASPECT2.DVASPECT_TRANSPARENT
member.summary: Represents the transparent or irregular parts of on object, typically parts that are expensive or impossible to clip out. Objects may or may not support this aspect.
